articles.author: KOB Web Staff
articles.title: 1 injured in gas leak explosion at Albuquerque house - KOB
articles.description: A person was taken to the hospital following an explosion at a house in Albuquerque.
articles.content:
ALBUQUERQUE, N.M.- A person was taken to the hospital following an explosion at a house in Albuquerque.
According to Albuquerque Fire Rescue, a homeowner reported the smell of gas to the gas company.

articles.author: Robert Channick, Lorraine Mirabella
articles.title: Hedge fund Alden looks to buy Baltimore Sun owner and go private in deal valuing newspaper chain at $520 million - Baltimore Sun
articles.description: Hedge fund Alden Global Capital is looking to buy Tribune Publishing and take the Chicago-based newspaper company private in a deal valued at $520 million.
